meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cruel.
meanings.sent1: Her cruelness towards animals was evident in how she mistreated them.
meanings.sent2: The cruelness of the dictator's actions shocked the entire nation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cruelness, the villain's antics in the movie made the audience laugh.
meanings.sent4: The cruelness of winter's icy grip seemed unrelenting.
meanings.sent5: The cruelness of the bully's words left lasting scars on the victim's self-esteem.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of cruelty.
meanings.sent1: The cruelness of the crime scene left the investigators speechless.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the cruelness of the hunter towards the defenseless animals was heartbreaking.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful cruelness towards the mouse ended in a surprising twist.
meanings.sent4: The cruelness of time's passage was reflected in the old, worn-out photographs.
meanings.sent5: The cruelness of fate seemed to have a twisted sense of humor in the story.
